mapper.select: SELECT * FROM admin_log ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin_log (action, target_type, meta, reason, description, ip_address, user_agent, created_at, actor_id, target_id) VALUES (#{action}, #{targetType}, #{meta}, #{reason}, #{description}, #{ipAddress}, #{userAgent}, #{createdAt}, #{actorId}, #{targetId})
mapper.update: UPDATE admin_log SET action = #{action}, target_type = #{targetType}, meta = #{meta}, reason = #{reason}, description = #{description}, ip_address = #{ipAddress}, user_agent = #{userAgent}, created_at = #{createdAt}, actor_id = #{actorId}, target_id = #{targetId} WHERE id = #{id}
